title: 2 different Tile materials with Vertex Paint option
longDescription:
This pack includes 2 different Tile materials with 3 way blend option (Vertex painting).

And 6 different Tile materials without Vertex paint option. (2 Types of tile materials with 3 variation for each Type)

All materials are in 2 resolutions: 1024x1024 and 2048x2048.


Each Vertex paint material comes with endless variation to avoid repeating patterns and boring looking environments.

Remove tiles to make a random look of damage or add fungus between the tiles with the paint tool inside of UE4.

Easy to use, just pick a color ( green = remove tiles, red = add fungus or blue = normal tiles) inside the UE4 paint mode and paint on your mesh to blend between different textures.


Watch the video to see how it works.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Brx6GHnw8os


A High poly mesh with enough vertices to paint on is recommended for vertex painting to get a proper result.


2 Vertex paint materials (for painting on high poly meshes) and 12 tile materials without vertex paint option for use on low poly meshes (without enough vertices to paint on)
technicalDetails:
Features: PBR Vertex paint materials

Number of Materials:

2 Master materials

  • 1 Vertex paint blend material
  • 1 Standard material (without vertex paint)

16 Instance materials

  • 4 Types of vertex paint blend tile material
  • 2 vertex paint materials in 2048x2048 (1 material for each type of Tiles)
  • 2 vertex paint materials in 1024x1024 (1 material for each type of Tiles)
  • 12 materials without vertex paint option
  • 2 types of tiles "normal" in 2 resolutions
  • 2 types of tiles "damaged" in 2 resolutions
  • 2 types of tiles "dirty" in 2 resolutions

(All materials are in 1024x1024 and 2048x2048 resolution)


Number of Textures:

  • Total number of Textures 36
  • 6 base color maps in 2048x2048
  • 6 base color maps in 1024x1024
  • 4 ambient occlusion maps in 2048x2048
  • 4 ambient occlusion maps in 1024x1024
  • 4 roughness maps in 2048x2048
  • 4 roughness maps in 1024x1024
  • 4 normal maps in 2048x2048
  • 4 normal maps in 1024x1024

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


Documentation here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/b8q0zg1kdg0uboh/documentation%20v1.pdf?dl=0

Important/Additional Notes: Vertex painting needs a high poly mesh with enough vertices to paint on to get a proper paint result.
